hanzi-su-wiki:
脹

Значения

Вздуваться, распухать

Мнемоника

Удлинение 長 любого органа 月 означает, что он распух.

Варианты

胀

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After a big meal I have a bloated stomach and flesh of my midsection gets longer.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " meat " to " long " sound. " Bulge " refers to the pressure on the inner wall of the body, causing discomfort. For example, in "Jijiu Pian" "cold venting and bloating of the abdomen", Yan Shigu's note: "Bloating means bloating of the abdomen." Another example is "Injury Theory. Differentiating and Treating Shaoyin Disease and Pulse Syndrome": "Shaoyin Disease, on the 6th or 7th day, those with abdominal distension and no bowel movements should be relieved in a hurry, and Dachengqi Decoction is appropriate."

" Expansion " means that the volume of an object becomes larger and expands. Such as "Book of Jin. "Han You Biography": "Between the whiskers, the bag swells like a blow."

" Bulge " is also the same as " up ", which means that the head is congested. For example, Cao Xueqin's "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 30 of the Qing Dynasty: "Baoyu knew that this was a mistake, but he couldn't regret it. His face flushed and swelled immediately, and he lowered his head without daring to make a sound."
humanum_short_description_en: From " meat " to " long " sound. " Bulge " refers to the pressure on the inner wall of the body, causing discomfort.
humanum_full_description:
從「肉」，「長」聲。「脹」指身體內壁受到壓迫，產生不適。如〈急就篇〉「寒氣泄注腹臚脹」，顏師古注：「脹，謂腹鼓脹也。」又如《傷害論．辨少陰病脈證并治》：「少陰病，六七日，腹脹不大便者，急下之，宜大承氣湯。」

　　「脹」表示物體體積變大、膨脹。如《晉書．韓友傳》：「斯須之間，見囊大脹如吹。」

　　「脹」又同「漲」，表示頭部充血。如清代曹雪芹《紅樓夢》第30回：「寶玉自知這話說的造次了，後悔不來，登時臉上紅脹起來，低著頭不敢則一聲。」
humanum_short_description: 從「肉」，「長」聲。「脹」指身體內壁受到壓迫，產生不適。

膨脹(ぼうちょう): expansion, swelling, increase, growth

從「 肉 」，「 長 」聲。「 脹 」指身體內壁受到壓迫，產生不適。如〈急就篇〉「寒氣泄注腹臚脹」，顏師古注：「脹，謂腹鼓脹也。」又如《傷害論．辨少陰病脈證并治》：「少陰病，六七日，腹脹不大便者，急下之，宜大承氣湯。」 「 脹 」表示物體體積變大、膨脹。如《晉書．韓友傳》：「斯須之間，見囊大脹如吹。」 「 脹 」又同「 漲 」，表示頭部充血。如清代曹雪芹《紅樓夢》第30回：「寶玉自知這話說的造次了，後悔不來，登時臉上紅脹起來，低著頭不敢則一聲。」
From " meat" to " long" sound. " Bulge" refers to the pressure on the inner wall of the body, causing discomfort. For example, in "Jijiu Pian" "cold venting and bloating of the abdomen", Yan Shigu's note: "Bloating means bloating of the abdomen." Another example is "Injury Theory. Differentiating and Treating Shaoyin Disease and Pulse Syndrome": "Shaoyin Disease, on the 6th or 7th day, those with abdominal distension and no bowel movements should be relieved in a hurry, and Dachengqi Decoction is appropriate." " Expansion" means that the volume of an object becomes larger and expands. Such as "Book of Jin. "Han You Biography": "Between the whiskers, the bag swells like a blow." " Bulge" is also the same as " up", which means that the head is congested. For example, Cao Xueqin's "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 30 of the Qing Dynasty: "Baoyu knew that this was a mistake, but he couldn't regret it. His face flushed and swelled immediately, and he lowered his head without daring to make a sound."

脹字的基本解释

脹
zhàng
见“胀”。

脹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàng］
［《廣韻》知亮切，去漾，知。］
亦作“瘬1”。“胀1”的繁体字。
(1)身体内壁受到压迫而产生的不适之感。亦泛指充塞难受的感觉。
(2)膨胀，体积变大。
(3)一种肉食。
[②]［cháng］
［《集韻》仲良切，平陽，澄。］
亦作“瘬2”。同“腸1”。“胀2”的繁体字。

脹字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　脹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页985第14
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?知亮切，音帳。腹滿也。【玉篇】左氏傳，將食，脹，如廁。脹，痛也。◎按左傳成十年，作張如厠，註，中亮反。【通雅】臚脹，謂腹鼓脹也。【急就章】寒氣泄注腹臚脹。　又【集韻】仲良切，音長。大小腸也。　【玉篇】字書亦作痮。

脹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
脹字的起名意思

暂无。
